#!usr/bin/python
#function for removing zeros at the end
def cut(n):
  
  if (n==0): 
    return 0;
  
  while(n>0):
    if(n%10 == 0):
      n=n/10;
    else:
      break;   
      
  return n;
  
  
  
case=input();
#taking input
string=[];
for i in range(case) :
	string.append(raw_input());
       	      
        	


#operating on them
for i in range(case):
	
	list=string[i].lower().split('x');
	
	l=len(list);
	
        #got the list of nos
        if ('0' in list):
          print "Robot hanged.";
          continue;
        
        t=1;
	for j in list:
        	j=int(j);
        	j=cut(j*t);
        	t=j;
        t=t%10;	
        	
	print t;
